items.name: The Arbiter's Seal
items.description: An obsidian signet ring that serves as the symbol of the High Arbiter's authority. Said to contain a fragment of the original realm before the Sundering.
items.function: Grants the bearer authority to speak for the Council. Can detect lies when pressed against a document.
items.origin: Crafted from the first obsidian formed during the Sundering
rules: Cannot be removed from bearer without consent
Glows when in presence of deception
Will not function for those with ill intent toward the realm
items.materialNotes: Pure obsidian with natural silver inclusions. Gem is unknown crystalline structure.

items.name: Veil Walker's Mask
items.description: A featureless white mask worn by members of the Veil Walkers. Each mask is unique and bonds to its wearer.
items.function: Conceals the wearer's identity from magical detection. Allows communication with other mask-wearers across distances.
items.materialNotes: Unknown material. Appears ceramic but is unbreakable. Warm to touch.

items.name: The Merchant's Ledger
items.description: The master ledger of the Merchant Consortium, containing records of all major trade agreements and debts across the realm.
items.function: Legal record of all consortium transactions. Entries are magically binding contracts.
items.origin: Created at the founding of the Consortium
rules: Entries cannot be erased or altered
Only the Grand Merchant can add new entries
Automatically updates copies held by trade masters
items.materialNotes: Dragon leather binding, vellum pages treated with preservation magic
